settings.what_you_need: 40ml House Blend espresso

settings.step_descriptions: Add the espresso, vodka and sugar syrup into your shaker.
Fill with ice and shake vigorously, it’ll take ten seconds with a good shake - you’ll know, because there’ll be a creamy head on it when you peek inside the shaker.
Garnish with three coffee beans to serve.

settings.title: Espresso Martini
settings.text: It’s really not a big mystery how we make the Grind Espresso Martini, there’s no secret recipe and no secret sauce to it - unless you count our espresso (which you probably should). If you didn’t know already - the Grind Espresso Martini is our signature, our baby, you could say. By that we mean we make a lot of them, like, a lot.
settings.final_touch_content:
Enjoy your Grind coffee black or with milk.
We recommend the Grind Milk Frother, if you’re using milk for the perfect coffee.
